# Module: tf.app



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/platform/app.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py).

Generic entry point script.

## Modules

[`flags`](../tf/flags) module: Import router for absl.flags. See https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py.

## Functions

[`run(...)`](../tf/app/run): Runs the program with an optional 'main' function and 'argv' list.
